attributes.action: prohibit individual or businesses in buying village/town domain names
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Four reasons why local domain names should be owned locally:

Domain names are still being purchased by business and individuals who do not place relevant information about the subject of the site especially when it comes to local parishes. 

The majority of Sweden has a domain name per parish and all information is relevant. Tourists are missing what our communities have to offer as nothing exists for them to do so. 

The local parish councils have to resort to using long domain names or names which are less relevant and not the first port of call for web users.

The lack of parish websites also can slow in-migration as people cannot find out information about what kind of a community they could be living in.
